components.description: A Mexican or Tex-Mex burrito, featuring a wrapped flour tortilla filled with such ingredients as beef, rice, beans, cheese, tomato, lettuce, and sour cream. Served in foil on several major platforms, suggesting a Mission burrito associated with San Francisco. Not to be confused with the Stuffed Flatbread.
components.title: Burrito

description: A Mexican or Tex-Mex burrito, featuring a wrapped flour tortilla filled with such ingredients as beef, rice, beans, cheese, tomato, lettuce, and sour cream. Served in foil on several major platforms, suggesting a Mission burrito associated with San Francisco. Not to be confused with the Stuffed Flatbread.
title: Burrito

version.description: The Unicode Consortium has approved the following 41 emoji characters as part of Unicode 8.0, released on June 17, 2015. This is comprised of 37 new emojis, plus five emoji modifiers. Find out more about this update on the Emojipedia Blog.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Food symbol
emoji_net_data.definition: A burrito emoji, a popular wrappedÂ Mexican food item. Shown wrapped in foil on some platforms. Burrito was approved as part of Unicode 8.0 i http://emojipedia.org/burrito/
emoji_net_data.name: burrito

bn:00106681a: Of, from, or pertaining to Mexico.
Of or relating to Mexico or its inhabitants

bn:00054679n: A native or inhabitant of Mexico
Person from Mexico or of Mexican descent.
A person from Mexico or of Mexican descent.

bn:00014050n: A burrito is a type of Mexican food consisting of a wheat flour tortilla wrapped or folded into a cylindrical shape to completely enclose the filling.
A flour tortilla folded around a filling
A Mexican dish consisting of a flour tortilla wrapped around a filling of meat and/or beans, cheese etc.

bn:00081674n: Cloak that is folded or wrapped around a person
In the context of clothing, a wrap can refer to a shawl or stole wrapped about the upper body, or a simple skirt-type garment made by wrapping a piece of material round the lower body.

bn:00035650n: Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.
